metadata.title: PM lauds LESCO employees for donating one-day salary to flood victims

content.article_body: LAHORE, Aug 29 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Friday appreciated the gesture of Lahore Electric Supply Company (LESCO) employees for donating their one-day salary, amounting to Rs. 20 million, to support flood victims. The Prime Minister termed the donation a commendable and exemplary act, saying that such initiatives reflect the spirit of solidarity in times of national hardship. He reaffirmed that the government stands shoulder to shoulder with all flood-affected people across the country and was utilizing all available resources to address their problems.
